overview.title: Toggle Switch Component
overview.description: A toggle switch represents a binary on/off state. It is typically implemented with a checkbox and styled as a switch.

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: JavaScript updates aria-checked or the underlying checkbox state and triggers change handlers.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Ensure the switch is reachable and operable via keyboard (Space/Enter).
Announce state with aria-checked when using role=\"switch\".
Provide visible focus and sufficient hit area.
Do not use a switch for destructive one-time actions; use a button instead.
Include an adjacent label to communicate the setting being toggled.
